notice_to_quit.pdf.title: Notice to Quit
notice_to_quit.pdf.notes: Common law notice to terminate tenancy. Must give minimum 4 weeks (28 days) notice for weekly/monthly tenancies. Must end on first or last day of tenancy period.

notice_of_intention.pdf.title: Notice of Intention to Seek Possession
notice_of_intention.pdf.notes: Statutory notice under Private Tenancies (NI) Order 2006. Must specify grounds. Minimum 28 days notice (14 days for Grounds 8, 14, 17). Served after or with Notice to Quit.

claim_for_possession.pdf.title: County Court Claim for Possession
claim_for_possession.pdf.notes: Official County Court claim form for possession proceedings in Northern Ireland. Must attach Notice to Quit, Notice of Intention, and all supporting evidence.
